title: Rasoterra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Spanish
description: Modern and cozy vegetarian bistro and tapas bar located in the city centre. Established Apr 2013. Most vegetables come from Rasoterra's own garden and are organically grown. Tapas is around 3-8 euros and entrees for 8-11 euros. Offers changing specials, organic wines and beers, free water. Weekend brunch served til 1pm. Has Wi-Fi.
